name: Magician Casino - Play Free Slots, Bingo, Poker and More!
name_original: Magician Casino - Play Free Slots, Bingo, Poker and More!
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true gambling functionality.
The All New Magician Casino™ - Spellbinding Slots, Poker, and Bingo games!

Magician Casino™ - one of the most popular real-world casino slot machine games – is finally available for FREE on mobile devices!

Now with the best FREE Slots, Video Poker, and Bingo games! Collect a free bihourly coin bonus and you’re sure to have some magical fun.

Fancy a hand of Poker? Perhaps a round of Bingo? Or some of the classic slots: The Magician, Wild Magic, or Joker’s Gold? All these casino games are FREE in Magician Casino™ right now!

***MAGICAL Games***
• 5 incredible SLOTS (The Magician, Wild Magic, and Joker’s Gold, Alice in Wonderland, Super 7's)
• 3 amazing POKER games (Jack's or Better, Joker's Wild, and Multi-Strike Poker™)
• 7 Fun BINGO rooms with unique styles

***SPECTACULAR Features***
• Magic Wheel Bonus – activate, spin the wheel, and get a guaranteed multiplier for your win!
• Wild Trails – dazzling free spins turning the entire reel WILD!
• Pick the Lady – find the Queen of Hearts and increase your take by up to 12x after any winning spin
•Locked-in Reels with a RE-SPIN BONUS – capture this bonus and reels re-spin, increasing your chances to win more even MORE!
•The Magic Wand – replace oh-so-close symbols with walloping WINS when this wondrous wand appears
•“Take-it-OR-Leave-it”– make a deal or take a chance with The Magician in this by-the-seat-of-your-pants mini-game!

*Mini-games – Hidden Quests ¬– Bonus Features – Wilds – and Magical SURPRISES!*

Whether, you’re winning a BINGO, getting a top hand in POKER or hitting the JACKPOT on a slot machine, you’ll have more free FUN than you can shake a wand at!

Vegas style slots, poker, and bingo game packed with fun tricks and topped-off with treasures! You’ll never know until you try Magician Casino™ - the ultimate spellbinding mobile slots experience!

Download Magician Casino™ now and see what magic awaits you!

Multi-Strike Poker is a trademark of IGT.
